timeElapse

public boolean timeElapse(long framestart,
                          long framenextstart,
                          java.util.LinkedList<RiffInterface> stack,
                          SamplerSetup sampler)
Description copied from interface: RiffInterface
do necessary stuff for the given time interval in frames.

Specified by:
timeElapse in interface RiffInterface
Parameters:
framestart - start of interval
framenextstart - start of next interval (one frame after interval ends)
stack - for modification of the RiffInterface-stack by the object
sampler - sampler object (use for hitting drums etc.)
Returns:
true to be removed from stack (after reaching the end of the riff)
